string-array.name: updates
string-array.item: v0.7.4: Minor bugs fixed, Better fling-support for headline-list and articles, no recommendation when typing URL
v0.7.3: Problems with API from 1.4.3.1 are (hopefully) resolved. Please mail me if i am wrong :)
v0.7.2: Fixed wrong calculation of unread-counts, Added welcome-dialog for the first-run
v0.7.1: Fixed no virtual Categories beeing displayed on first start, fixed two unhandled Exceptions
v0.7: Improved updating of locally stored information, faster startup, better restarting of activities, fixed sorting-issues of feeds, fixed double-login, fixed progress-indicator
v0.6.8: Fixed only one article beeing displayed, Notification for finished downloads of attachments
v0.6.6: Fixed no articles beeing fetched with getArticles and problem with VirtualCategories
v0.6.5: Fixed problem with attached images, Changed update-behaviour
v0.6.4: Fix for concurrent DB-Access, SDCard not used anymore, smaller memory-footprint, added Changelog
v0.6.3: Refactored a lot, fixed some synchronisation issues, better Fling-Recognition
v0.6.2: Added the license to all files, added Update-Check
v0.6.1: Passwords can contain special characters, Download of attached Audio/Video files)
v0.6: Better check for connectivity, show attached videos and play music
